title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup Set<Class<?> classSet is not expecting class
description: When invoking the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method with a Set<Class<?>> classSet, the output is always 'MySomeClass', instead of the expected output 'MySomeAnn'.
OB: The observed behavior is that when calling the onStartup method with a classSet containing classes annotated with '@MySomeAnn', the output is 'MySomeClass'.
EB: The expected behavior is that when calling the onStartup method with a classSet containing classes annotated with '@MySomeAnn', the output should be 'MySomeAnn'.
